item.title: Report X-2023080320
item.description:
Report X-2023080320

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-29T21:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-28
  • City: INDIANAPOLIS
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: A fiberboard box with signs of release we found during sort operations at the INDH facility. The fiberboard box contained four metal cans and one of the cans was bent on the side causing the lid to open. All contents were placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration is needed for movement.

item.title: Report X-2023070453
item.description:
Report X-2023070453

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-29T21:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-14
  • City: INDIANAPOLIS
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On July 14th a drum was discovered dented with a small leak. The drum contained UN3082, Environmentally Hazardous Substance, 9, III. The spill was cleaned up and the drum was able to be placed into a steel salvage drum. The shipper was contacted for an amended shippers declaration.

item.title: Report E-2023080320
item.description:
Report E-2023080320

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-11
  • City: FREMONT
  • State: IN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading the warehouse crew accidentally put a forklift fork into one of the metal 5 gallon cans of paint (un1263) releasing 1 pint of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.
